description: Bootstrap carousel.js v3.2.0 implementation defining the Carousel class and plugin API, managing carousel behavior including slide transitions, controls, and event handling.

classes.name: Carousel
classes.description: Class managing carousel behavior, including slide transitions, controls, and event handling.

methods.name: keydown
methods.description: Handles keyboard events for carousel navigation.

methods.name: cycle
methods.description: Starts or stops automatic cycling of the carousel.

methods.name: getItemIndex
methods.description: Returns the index of a given carousel item.

methods.name: to
methods.description: Transitions the carousel to a specific item index.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Transitions to the next carousel item.

methods.name: prev
methods.description: Transitions to the previous carousel item.

methods.name: slide
methods.description: Performs the slide transition to the next or previous item.
